productInfo.name: Sakaseya Sakase [w/ DVD, Limited Edition]
productInfo.des: Much anticipated new release featured as main theme to hit anime's theatrical release.

productInfo.name: Greatest Hits 2011-2017 Alter Ego [Regular Edition]
productInfo.des: First greatest hits album of EGOIST featuring 15 titles (13 from anime series) in remastered edition.

productInfo.name: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress [Regular Edition]
productInfo.des: EGOIST brings the seventh single. The title song is an intro theme for the TV anime series Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress.
